Articles.Content:
When I place a probe into a polar orbit the game won't let me go out to the Space Center, I have to either end or resume flight.

Normal glitch they are working on or...?
It isn't the orbit... have you got the throttle up?
Never had it myself nor heard of it. Is it with every polar orbit or just probes? Or just that one probe?

Hit "X" to make sure your throttle isn't up. That might have some effect.

Is it a directly polar orbit or just highly inclined equatorial?
I will have to check that next time. Thanks guys!

Hit "X" to make sure your throttle isn't up. That might have some effect.

Is it a directly polar orbit or just highly inclined equatorial?

Yes, each of them were directly polar.
Oh and check that you haven't got the time speed above 1x. I found that it wouldn't let me get out when that happened a few times.
